com.spid.android.sdk.accesstoken

Class SPiDAccessToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spid.android.sdk.accesstoken.SPiDAccessToken

  • public class SPiDAccessToken
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an access token sent from SPiD

    • Constructor Detail

      • SPiDAccessToken

        public SPiDAccessToken(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
        Constructor for SPiDAccessToken object, used with response from SPiD
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - Parsed JSON response from SPiD
        Throws:
        SPiDAccessTokenException - if required fields "access_token" or "expires_in" could not be parsed from jsonObject

      • SPiDAccessToken

        public SPiDAccessToken(java.lang.String accessToken,
                       java.lang.Long expiresAt,
                       java.lang.String refreshToken,
                       java.lang.String userID)
        Constructor for SPiDAccessToken object, used when loading from SharedPreferences
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Access token
        expiresAt - Date when access token expires
        refreshToken - Refresh token
        userID - User id for the access token

    • Method Detail

      • getAccessToken

        public java.lang.String getAccessToken()
        Returns:
        Access token used to make requests to SPiD

      • getExpiresAt

        public java.util.Date getExpiresAt()
        Returns:
        Expiry date for the access token

      • isExpired

        public boolean isExpired()
        Returns:
        true if the access token has expired

      • getRefreshToken

        public java.lang.String getRefreshToken()
        Returns:
        The refresh token that should be used to refresh the access token

      • getUserID

        public java.lang.String getUserID()
        Returns:
        The user id associated with this access token

      • isClientToken

        public boolean isClientToken()
        Returns:
        true if token is a client token i.e. belongs to a merchant and not a user, otherwise false
